skits.presenter: Anna needs to write ✍ a letter ✉️ and uses a tool that has ink. What is she using?
skits.responseCorrect: Exactly! Anna is using a pen. 🖋
skits.responseIncorrect: No, Anna is not using a pencil. ✏ She is using a pen. 🖋

skits.presenter: David is organizing 🗂 his notes and needs something to hold them together. What does he need?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! David needs a paperclip. 📎
skits.responseIncorrect: Nope, David does not need scissors. ✂ He needs a paperclip. 📎

skits.presenter: Sophia wants to make her work neat and uses something to erase her mistakes. What is she using?

skits.responseIncorrect: Not quite, Sophia is not using a pencil. ✏ She needs to erase, 🧽 remember?

skits.responseIncorrect: Not exactly, a fountain pen 🖋 wouldn't help in this situation.
